description: As Team Lead at Paz Technologies, I oversee a dynamic team of developers, guiding them in delivering high-quality software solutions. My role includes coordinating project timelines, managing resources, and ensuring smooth collaboration across teams. I also provide technical mentorship, ensuring our projects meet client expectations while maintaining efficiency and innovation.

As a Software Engineer at Digitaleap, I spent three years working on diverse technologies, delivering end-to-end solutions for multiple projects. I played a key role in designing, developing, and deploying web applications while ensuring high-quality results. This experience enhanced my expertise in full-stack development and project management..

As an Assistant Developer at Minibig, I contributed to projects using PHP, Laravel, and JavaScript. I supported senior developers by troubleshooting issues, writing clean code, and implementing small features. This role helped me sharpen my problem-solving skills and gain hands-on experience in a collaborative development environment.
